snippet.title: Valheim Hearth & Home – Out now!
snippet.description:
Ready your hearths and your homes, for there are many new things to discover in Valheim right now! Can you spot all the new stuff? And what were the vikings so afraid of at the end…?

Hearth & Home is available now!

Buy Valheim now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/892970/Valheim/

Valheim is made by developer Iron Gate, published by Coffee Stain Publishing.

https://www.valheimgame.com

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCr3Yfz4Ts_K4bAyMCoVXeyA

https://twitter.com/Valheimgame

https://discord.com/invite/Valheim

https://www.tiktok.com/@valheimofficial

https://www.facebook.com/valheimgame

https://www.instagram.com/valheim_official
